title: Vue JS 3 - The Complete Guide (w/ Vue Router & Vuex)
subtitle: Master Vue.js with a comprehensive, project-based approach
description: Build modern frontend applications with Vue 3. Covers components, reactivity, routing, and state management.

title: Next.js & React - The Complete Guide (incl. Redux, Hooks, etc.)
subtitle: Build highly performant and scalable React applications
description: Learn Next.js for server-side rendering, static site generation, API routes, and deployment.

title: GCP - Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect Certification
subtitle: Pass the Google Cloud Certified Professional Cloud Architect exam
description: Comprehensive preparation for the GCP Cloud Architect exam. Covers design, development, and management of cloud solutions.

title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals AZ-900 Exam Prep
subtitle: Get Certified with Azure Fundamentals
description: Prepare for the AZ-900 certification exam with practical labs. Understand cloud concepts, Azure services, and pricing.

title: Java Programming Masterclass for Software Developers
subtitle: Become a Java Master: Learn Java 11 & Spring Boot
description: The most comprehensive Java course online. Covers core Java, concurrency, databases, and Spring Boot.

title: Spring Framework 6: Master Class
subtitle: Learn Spring Core, MVC, Data JPA, REST & AOP
description: Dive deep into the Spring Framework ecosystem. Build enterprise-grade applications with Spring Boot and Spring MVC.

title: Microservices with Spring Cloud: A Practical Guide
subtitle: Build Scalable Microservices with Spring Boot and Spring Cloud
description: Design and implement microservices architectures. Covers Eureka, Ribbon, Hystrix, and API Gateway.

title: Design Patterns in Java
subtitle: Learn to write clean, reusable, and maintainable code
description: Understand Gang of Four design patterns and apply them in Java. Covers Creational, Structural, and Behavioral patterns.

title: The Science of Well-Being
subtitle: Improve your happiness through psychological research
description: A popular course from Yale University on happiness. Learn about common misconceptions about happiness and practical strategies.

title: Financial Markets
subtitle: An Introduction to the World of Finance
description: Explore the fundamentals of financial markets and institutions. Learn about stocks, bonds, derivatives, and financial crises.

title: Introduction to Computer Science and Programming in Python
subtitle: Learn the basics of computing with Python
description: A foundational course from MIT OpenCourseWare. Covers computational thinking, algorithms, and data structures.

title: Google UX Design Professional Certificate
subtitle: Learn the fundamentals of UX design
description: Prepare for a career in the fast-growing field of UX design. Covers user research, wireframing, prototyping, and testing.

title: Blender 3D: From Beginner to Pro
subtitle: Master Blender for 3D modeling, animation, and rendering
description: Comprehensive guide to Blender's powerful features. Learn modeling, sculpting, texturing, rigging, and animation.

title: The Python & Django Full Stack Web Developer Bootcamp
subtitle: Build powerful web applications with Python and Django
description: Learn Django from basics to deployment. Covers Django ORM, views, templates, and REST APIs.

title: Node.js, Express, MongoDB & More: The Complete Bootcamp 2025
subtitle: Master Node.js with a comprehensive, project-based approach
description: Build APIs, integrate databases, and deploy Node.js apps. Covers Mongoose, authentication, and deployment.

title: Artificial Intelligence A-Z™ 2025: Learn How To Build An AI
subtitle: Build AI for Games, Reinforcement Learning, and more
description: Explore AI concepts and build practical AI solutions. Covers Q-learning, Deep Q-learning, and A3C.
